website_summaries.verdict: If all you want in a coffee machine is the ability to brew drinkable joe quickly without busting the budget,  the attractive Capresso MT600 fits the bill -- just don't expect gourmet results.
pros: The Capresso MT600 costs less than premium coffee makers, brews 10 cups in under eight minutes and looks good doing it
cons: The MT600 won't provide you with a delightfully delicious brew and fills the air with distracting gurgles

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife used one of these for around 12 years. She decided to get something new. After 3 new coffee makers she decided to get a new version of what she had. Loves the coffee from this coffee maker and says the temp. Is just right. Hopefully this one will last as long as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Thempeople

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: We love our Capresso MT600 coffee pot. People had complained about the coffee not being hot enough but we did not find that to be true. With any carafe you will need to pre-heat with hot water while you get the rest of the coffee pot ready. It only takes a minutes to let hot water sit in the carafe to pre-heat. With that said you obviously can not do that when you use the auto setting but we found the coffee to still be quite hot regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 months!  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My previous coffee maker, which theoretically was identical to this one lasted almost 10 years. This one broke after 10 months. Amazon was not able to assist me in getting a replacement. Very disappointing experience with both Capresso and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Capresso maker for over 20 years and the water vessel began to leak. I was very excited about this one, but it began leaking on day 2, both when pouring and underneath the maker. I tried for 4 days, but had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kasie

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: We've had a Capresso for 5 years now and keep transporting it from our northern home to our southern home. Well, it was time to leave the old Capresso at home and purchase a new one for our second home. Both pots make wonderful coffee, and both pots keep that coffee hot for hours as they are both the stainless steel carafe style. This new pot, however, has one fault; it is EXTREMELY noisy. The older pot is very quiet, but this one is the opposite. Other than that--a good coffee pot....great brand.
customer_reviews.author: trisha1008

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, badly designed
customer_reviews.text: This coffeemaker was purchased for an office of about 10 people. Very quickly we noticed that it was difficult to pour coffee without significant dripping - necessitating clean up after pouring every cup of coffee. In cleaning the counter I moved the coffeemaker to reveal a large black spot where the coffeemaker had been sitting. After contacting the manufacturer, customer service maintained this was not a design or manufacturing flaw, but user error because a little notch was not exactly centered over the spout. After a few tries, I had difficulty always getting the notch in the magic spot. Makes decent coffee but also makes a mess!
customer_reviews.author: K. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Had one for over 20 years and was happy to finally find it again
customer_reviews.text: Had one for over 20 years and was happy to finally find it again. Great to take carafe to porch and enjoy a perfectly brewed cup or two of coffee
customer_reviews.author: mike kenney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy brand

customer_reviews.author: Charles H Knull

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Hot, Hot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coffe machine about 2 years ago because my wife like her coffee HOT. It does just that. She's used it for 2 years now daily without issue. Still hot as ever and makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Maker I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker brews coffee at exactly the right temperature for immediate drinking. It cannot be chipped or broken since it is all steel. It is energy efficient since the carafe is a thermos type device so the heater does not stay on to waste energy. The coffee stays hot for quite a few hours. Also, I consider it the safest coffee pot that I have owned as you don't have to remember to turn the heater off later.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia M. Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is super great. Makes great coffee every time!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: doesn't make hot coffee, doesn't keep it hot, system leaks after a few uses. Would not recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes quick great coffee every time. I have two of these makers in the house at different places. I fill the machine with RO purified water and find the charcoal filters last much longer. I have also found that I do not really need the charcoal filter at all using RO water. We also have coffee hot and ready all day long. Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great way to wake up!
customer_reviews.text: The Capresso MT600 10-cup programmable coffeemaker with stainless-steel thermal carafe is everything it is promoted to be. It is easy to program; the coffee is delicious (in fact you use less), the coffee never tastes stale because it is not sitting on a warmer but it remains hot for hours. This is our second Capresso and we would not buy another brand of coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Capresso coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: This machine was reviewed as being one of the better ones for brewing coffee at the right temperature and it lives up to that reputation. I have no complaints about it other than I wish it were a 12-cup coffeemaker and that it is noisier than most coffeemakers I have had. I'd rate it as a very good buy for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!!!

I have not had this problem because I get my coffee after him and take the lid off. The coffee is hot when I get to it, later than him. Great coffee and warm for a thermal carafe.

customer_reviews.title: Preferred older model
customer_reviews.text: Our older model Capresso (of about 15 years ago) finally died, but it was perfect in all ways. This newer model is disappointing in that the urn's lid is much more unforgiving in getting it properly closed. This is probably the most frustrating issue. Secondarily, this model is definitely slower in brewing, and the size of the unit is slightly larger which unfortunately made it unable to clear the cabinet where the older one fit perfectly. If we had known about these changes, we would not have purchased this brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: If it's not Capresso, I'm going back to bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the discontinued Elegance Therm. This is a nice item for the money, as with most Capresso products. It brews at a high temperature, and quickly, a full pot in 7-8 minutes. Capresso seems to have improved their carafes, this one stays hotter longer that my previous ones. I gave it 4 stars because I don't particularly like the water level indicator. It is at an awkward angle when pouring in the water, and is subject to scale build-up. Markings in the tank itself would be better. Be aware that the unit makes quite a racket while brewing...living alone I don't mind.

product_meta.title: Capresso MT600 10-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker with Stainless-Steel Thermal Carafe
product_meta.description: Brew up to 10 cups of delicious, full-flavored coffee in under eight minutes with this programmable coffeemaker. The machine provides an illuminated, 24-hour, LCD digital clock and timer with soft-touch controls for easy operation. Set the timer so that fresh, hot coffee awaits dinner guests when it's time to serve dessert or so that the aroma of a freshly brewed pot fills the house a few minutes before the alarm goes off in the morning. The coffeemaker supplies a 10-cup stainless-steel thermal carafe with an ergonomic stay-cool handle, brew-through lid, and drip-free pouring spout. Removing the carafe from the coffeemaker stops the flow of coffee and allows for sneaking a quick cup before the end of the brewing process. Simply replace the carafe to restart the flow of coffee. Another thoughtful detail includes its special smaller-amount setting, which ensures maximum aroma when brewing just 3 to 5 cups at a time. For added convenience, the coffeemaker features a stainless-steel-lined heating system that eliminates contact with aluminum and reduces the need for decalcifying, the ability to retain programming during short power outages, and automatic shut-off after two hours for safety and peace of mind. Other highlights include a handy water-level indicator, a washable gold-tone filter (no need for disposable paper filters), a charcoal water filter that removes up to 82-percent of chlorine and other impurities from tap water, and an electronic indicator that shows when to replace the charcoal filter, as well as milled steel housing for superior strength and style and concealed cord storage to keep countertops looking tidy. The coffeemaker measures approximately 9 by 8 by 14 inches.
feature_bullets: 10-cup programmable coffeemaker with stainless-steel-lined heating system
Illuminated, 24-hour, LCD digital clock and timer; soft-touch controls
Brew-pause function; 2-hour auto shut-off for safety; cord storage
Includes stainless-steel thermal carafe, gold-tone filter, and charcoal water filter
